description: This Java class 'ResumeParserService' provides functionality to extract text from resume files, parse skills based on a predefined list, and extract keywords based on frequency. It integrates with a repository for persistence and uses Apache Tika for text extraction.

classes.name: ResumeParserService
classes.description: A service class that extracts and processes resume content, identifying skills and keywords, and saving the processed resume to a repository.

methods.name: parseAndPersist
methods.description: Extracts text from a resume file, identifies skills and keywords, constructs a Resume object, and saves it to the repository.

methods.name: extractText
methods.description: Uses Apache Tika to parse and extract textual content from the file at the given path.

methods.name: extractSkills
methods.description: Identifies known skills present in the resume text based on a predefined list.

methods.name: extractKeywords
methods.description: Extracts and ranks keywords by frequency from the resume text.
